## Summary
Build a dashboard that visualizes inputs and prediction results (charts for study hours, absences, extracurricular involvement, and predicted SGPA).

## Goals
- Interactive charts and filters
- Exportable visual reports (PDF/CSV)
- Mobile-friendly layout

## Acceptance criteria
- Dashboard UI (React/Vue or server-rendered) under `frontend/` or `static/`
- Example charts and sample data wired to the prediction API
- Documentation on how to run the dashboard locally

## Tasks
- [ ] Choose charting library and scaffold dashboard
- [ ] Integrate with prediction API for live previews
- [ ] Add sample dashboards and export functionality
